string.text: Sidrovich contracted you to run a hit. Find and eliminate the target then return to Sidrovich for payment.

I have a list of outstanding bounties and stalkers that need taken care of. The worst kind of scum and villainy usually end up on this list... for various reasons. The Zone needs it's trash taken out from time to time. What do you say, stalker, will you be my "hired gun?"
Eliminate bandits at the Car Park
Stage an assault on the Car Park and eliminate the bandits that occupy the location.

Bandits have taken up base in the old Car Park. These assholes mug or kill anyone who use the roads leading in and out of the camp. It is disrupting local activities for my clients and the stalkers who take refuge in camp. It's hurting business! I need you to "take care" of them. If you want, talk to Fanatic, he may be able to offer you assistance.

Wolf asked you to purge an area of all mutant threat in order to ensure the safety of rookie village; as well as the stalkers who pass through Cordon. Reach the location and eliminate all mutants around the area. Return to Wolf for payment after you job is complete.

Stalker, I need someone to who is a bit more experienced than the rookies for a task. Cordon is becoming a very dangerous place with all this rampant mutant breeding going on. I need you to hunt around an area that I will mark on your PDA. The job is to kill any mutants you see. If you do this for me, it will earn you some cash. So will you?
You have been asked to retrieve a %s. Bring it back to Xenotech if you happen to get your hands on one.

I need a favor, man. A lot of stalkers come by here asking if I can tune their weapons a certain way but I can't. I just don't have the right tools. I would be able to perform upgrades on a greater variety of equipment if I can just get my hands on the right tools. Please, man, will you help me out?
Great, man! I need a %s. It should contain some tools I need to do some work on weapons. If you can bring one back for me I will be grateful, I will even pay you for it.
Okay, yeah, this is exactly what I need. Here, I promised you payment; take it.
You have been asked to retrieve a %s. He needs more advanced tools to perform even better upgrades. Bring it back to Xenotech if you happen to get your hands on one.

My business is booming now, more and more stalkers come to me when they need their weapon fine-tuned. But I could really use more tools. You brought me a quality toolset last time but I need an even higher quality set. If you are interested, I will tell you what I need.
I need an %s. If you can bring one back for me I will be grateful, I will even pay you for it.
Yes, yes! Here is some cash, you deserve it.
